original_text: ‘Remember the rules that I gave to my servant Moses at Sinai mountain. Those rules and laws were for all the Israelites to obey. 4: See Exodus 20:1-17. ‘Remember the rules that I gave to my servant Moses at Sinai mountain. Those rules and laws were for all the Israelites to obey.
korean_text: 너희는 내가 호렙에서 온 이스라엘을 위하여 내 종 모세에게 명령한 법 곧 율례와 법도를 기억하라

sentences.original_text: that I gave to my servant Moses
were for all the Israelites to obey
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 이스라엘 사람들이 지키기 위한 것이었다
